expected_findings.description: Command injection via file upload filename

evidence.response_snippet:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Command Injection Lab</title>
    <style>
        body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; margin: 40px; }
        .container { max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; }
        h1 { color: #333; }
        .form { margin: 20px 0; }
        input, textarea { width: 100%; padding: 10px; margin: 5px 0; }
        button { padding: 10px 20px; margin-top: 10px; }
        .result { background: #f5f5f5; padding: 15px; margin: 10px 0; white-space: pre-wrap; }
        .er
evidence.note: Command output detected in response (HTML parsing improved)
